item.title: Native Instruments Sale (50% off)
item.description: Native Instruments’ amazing Summer of Sound is back. Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of expansions 50% off Komplete 14 upgrades 50% off Traktor Pro 3 updates 50% off Instrument & effect upgrades 50% off iZotope All offers end on 6th July 2023 See the full details here; https://www.native-instruments.com/en/catalog/summer-of-sound-2023/komplete-bundles/ Summer of Sound Sale (2023)
item.content:encoded:
Native Instruments’ amazing Summer of Sound is back.

Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of expansions

  • 50% off Komplete 14 upgrades
  • 50% off Traktor Pro 3 updates
  • 50% off Instrument & effect upgrades
  • 50% off iZotope

All offers end on 6th July 2023

See the full details here;

  • https://www.native-instruments.com/en/catalog/summer-of-sound-2023/komplete-bundles/

item.title: New Ableton Push 3
item.description: About Ableton have just announced they have a new version of their Push controller Ableton Push 3 Standalone There are 2 configurations Push 3 Standalone Push 3 £1,669 £879 Use Push as a standalone instrument Connect Push to your computer 64 expressive pads 64 expressive pads Built-in audio interface Built-in audio interface Intel 11th Gen Core™ i3-1115G4 processor with 8GB of RAM Add a processor, battery and hard drive later using the Upgrade Kit - £879 (available late 2023) Built-in lithium battery with up to 2.
item.content:encoded:
About

Ableton have just announced they have a new version of their Push controller

There are 2 configurations

Push 3 Standalone Push 3
£1,669 £879
Use Push as a standalone instrument Connect Push to your computer
64 expressive pads 64 expressive pads
Built-in audio interface Built-in audio interface
Intel 11th Gen Core™ i3-1115G4 processor with 8GB of RAM Add a processor, battery and hard drive later using the Upgrade Kit - £879 (available late 2023)
Built-in lithium battery with up to 2.5 hours play time
Built-in 256GB SSD hard drive
Replace processor, battery and hard drive as technology improves

Full Comparison

  • https://www.ableton.com/en/push/tech-specs/#compare-configurations-for-push

YouTube Videos

Introducing Push 3: An expressive standalone instrument

5 Cool Features of ABLETON PUSH 3

item.title: List of Music Production Courses & Reviews
item.description: Music Production Courses General Ask Video Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments … Born to Produce Groove3 Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine … macProVideo Point Blank Music School Steinberg Udemy Music Theory ThinkSpace Education General Composition Harmony One Harmony Two How To Write Music Learn Music Theory (Guy Michelmore) Piano Lessons Flowkey Piano Genius Piano University Pianote Skoove YouTube Channels Mastering․com Mix with the Masters School of Synthesis Music Production Reviews YouTube Channels Andertons - Music hardware & software reviews Doctor Mix - Weekly reviews, tips & techniques on music production, mixing and mastering Guy Michelmore / ThinkSpace Education Jef Gibbons - Video production, photography & music production Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - Synthesizer reviews & music production Sanjay C - Music production, gear & tips Simeon Amburgey - Virtual instruments from developers all over the world Sound On Sound - Recording & music technology magazine Venus Theory - Music production & reviews Woody Piano Shack - Music production & reviews Other YouTube Channels Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer In The Mix Underdog Electronic Music School State Azure - Electronic music producer from the UK Music Software & Plugin Deals Audio Plugin Guy
item.content:encoded:
Music Production Courses

General

  • Ask Video
    • Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments …
  • Born to Produce
  • Groove3
    • Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine …
  • macProVideo
  • Point Blank Music School
  • Steinberg
  • Udemy

Music Theory

  • ThinkSpace Education
    • General Composition
      • Harmony One
      • Harmony Two
      • How To Write Music
      • Learn Music Theory (Guy Michelmore)

Piano Lessons

  • Flowkey
  • Piano Genius
  • Piano University
  • Pianote
  • Skoove

YouTube Channels

  • Mastering․com
  • Mix with the Masters
  • School of Synthesis

Music Production Reviews

YouTube Channels

  • Andertons - Music hardware & software reviews
  • Doctor Mix - Weekly reviews, tips & techniques on music production, mixing and mastering
  • Guy Michelmore / ThinkSpace Education
  • Jef Gibbons - Video production, photography & music production
  • Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - Synthesizer reviews & music production
  • Sanjay C - Music production, gear & tips
  • Simeon Amburgey - Virtual instruments from developers all over the world
  • Sound On Sound - Recording & music technology magazine
  • Venus Theory - Music production & reviews
  • Woody Piano Shack - Music production & reviews

Other

YouTube Channels

  • Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer
  • In The Mix
  • Underdog Electronic Music School
  • State Azure - Electronic music producer from the UK

Music Software & Plugin Deals

  • Audio Plugin Guy

item.title: My Favourite Producers, DJs, Artists, Bands, Concerts & Shows
item.description: Producers Above & Beyond Anthony Marinelli Armin Van Buuren Calvin Harris DJ Fresh Jeremy Ellis Mezerg Paul Hardcastle Technotronic DJs Andy Farley Andy Whitby BK Carl Nicholson Guyver Jaguar Skills Paul Glazby Paul Maddox Arists & Bands Al Marconi Awesome 3 Barry Manilow Bronski Beat Carpenters Christopher Cross Coldplay Craig David Curiosity Killed The Cat D:Ream Dadi Freyr Deacon Blue Dead Or Alive Eagles Erasure Fleetwood Mac Gloria Estefan Howard Jones Hyper Go Go Josh Groban Kool & The Gang Kylie Minogue Level 42 Lighthouse Family Limahl Maria Carey Matt Johnson Michael Jackson Pet Shop Boys Rozalla Shades of Rhythm The Beach Boys The Communards The Cure The Piano Guys Tony Mortimer Years & Years Youngr Concerts Erasure Howard Jones Pet Shop Boys Prince - Lovesexy Theatre Shows Cats Les Miserables Mary Poppins Phantom of the Opera Woman in White
